long_description: With the option to transform into a plush neck pillow by packing into its own interior pocket, the lightweight, weather-resistant Merrell Rowena jacket is a great choice for travel. Smooth polyester shell is wind- and water-resistant; Durable Water Repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off. Merrell Conductor(TM) Ultralight liner creates a micro-thermal barrier that retains heat and keeps you cozy without adding bulk. The Merrell Rowena jacket features ruched yoke seams and soft, stretchy peach-faced fabric at the neck and cuffs. Zippered hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: With the option to transform into a plush neck pillow by packing into its own interior pocket, the lightweight, weather-resistant Merrell Rowena jacket is a great choice for travel.
